attributes.action: Islas Malvinas, Georgias del Sur y Sándwich del Sur
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I'm 53 years old and have lived the horror of 1982 and the war, I want for my children and grandchildren as an outcome in that circumstance, I have lived half my life under government dictatorial, the other half we've lived in a democracy, made many mistakes, you also asks you already. the entire government of his country and his people, we have the negotiating on the status of sovereignty of the islands, capacity please do not avallacen, negotiate and meet me in righteousness.parliament to parliament, government to government, people,town. Peace talks, Peace, agree. Que No are the dead which a history between us. this sea which is the opportunity that God guide us

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
